generateHtml (  )  [protected]

Generate our widget's html

Returns:
string

Reimplemented from CPSWidget.

Definition at line 82 of file CPSPortlet.php.

    {
        if ( ! $this->visible )
            return;

        if ( $this->jqui ) 
        {
            $this->headerCssClass = trim( 'ui-widget-header ' . $this->headerCssClass );
            $this->contentCssClass = trim( 'ui-widget-content ' . $this->contentCssClass );
        }
            
        echo PS::openTag( 'div', array( 'class' => $this->cssClass ) ) . PHP_EOL;
        if ( $this->title ) echo PS::tag( 'div', array( 'class' => $this->headerCssClass ), $this->title ) . PHP_EOL;
        echo PS::openTag( 'div', array( 'class' => $this->contentCssClass ) ) . PHP_EOL;
    }

renderContent (  )  [protected]

Renders the content of this portlet. If object is set to auto-render, the view with the same name as this portlet will be rendered when called

Returns:
string

Reimplemented in CPSThemeRoller.
